Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. Reporting to the Development Lead the successful candidate will also contribute to align with the quality standards and test strategy/process of the company and to continuously drive improvements.
Main duties and responsibilities
· Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations
· Create, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases. These tests concern functional as well as non-functional (quality) criteria of the systems under test.
· Create and maintain test data
· Become and stay an expert in the setup, configuration, and usage of the applications under test
· Perform deployments for testing purposes
· Understand the business processes and business needs for being able to perform reasonable exploratory testing
· Provide reasonable quality information and test reporting of your tests, highlight possible delays in time
· Coordinate/cooperate with the team, the QA organisation, the Product Owner, and other stakeholders
· Join and contribute to agile team meetings (backlog grooming, retrospective, review, …)
· Take a leading role on certain releases or projects within the team
· Identify improvement needs and actively drive its implementations in cooperation with the team
· Show high quality focus in all aspects of the role: documentation, test definition and results, communication, processes

Job_title: Research Engineer - Optoelectronics and Laser Engineer for Photonics System Technologies (f/m/d)
Description:
Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.
Design optical setups and test benches and perform optics and laser-oriented test and experiments focused on state-of-the-art solid state and fibre-laser products and subassemblies.
Participate in the concept and requirements definition, new technology assessments, and evaluation of alternative technical solutions.
Evaluate laser and laser component performance at the component and system levels via both modelling and hands-on experimental methods.
Keep up to date with the latest technology, practices and concepts in solid state and fibre lasers, optical MEMS, fibre optic technology and communication.

Description:
01 Our Offer
Job.
Are you ready for the next step in your career? Interested in leading the development of our semiconductor processing equipment? With us, you are not a small number in a huge hierarchy. With us, YOU CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE!
NexGen Wafer Systems develops, manufactures, markets and services a line of unique semiconductor processing equipment for chip makers that drive our ever more powerful, smarter and reliable electronics. Everything we do, starts with you.
Together with you, we build the most human-centric fintech. We have the ambition to create the next. And - with Bertelsmann - a strong foundation to start from. Let’s make it new – for society and for yourself.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Description:
Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.
Design optical setups and test benches and perform optics and laser-oriented test and experiments focused on state-of-the-art solid state and fibre-laser products and subassemblies.
Participate in the concept and requirements definition, new technology assessments, and evaluation of alternative technical solutions.

Keep up to date with the latest technology, practices and concepts in solid state and fibre lasers, optical MEMS, fibre optic technology and communication.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. Reporting to the Development Lead the successful candidate will also contribute to align with the quality standards and test strategy/process of the company and to continuously drive improvements.
Main duties and responsibilities
· Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations
· Create, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases. These tests concern functional as well as non-functional (quality) criteria of the systems under test.
· Create and maintain test data
· Become and stay an expert in the setup, configuration, and usage of the applications under test
· Perform deployments for testing purposes
· Understand the business processes and business needs for being able to perform reasonable exploratory testing
· Provide reasonable quality information and test reporting of your tests, highlight possible delays in time
· Coordinate/cooperate with the team, the QA organisation, the Product Owner, and other stakeholders
· Join and contribute to agile team meetings (backlog grooming, retrospective, review, …)
· Take a leading role on certain releases or projects within the team
· Identify improvement needs and actively drive its implementations in cooperation with the team
· Show high quality focus in all aspects of the role: documentation, test definition and results, communication, processes

Description:
Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.
Design optical setups and test benches and perform optics and laser-oriented test and experiments focused on state-of-the-art solid state and fibre-laser products and subassemblies.
Participate in the concept and requirements definition, new technology assessments, and evaluation of alternative technical solutions.

Keep up to date with the latest technology, practices and concepts in solid state and fibre lasers, optical MEMS, fibre optic technology and communication.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. Reporting to the Development Lead the successful candidate will also contribute to align with the quality standards and test strategy/process of the company and to continuously drive improvements.
Main duties and responsibilities
· Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations
· Create, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases. These tests concern functional as well as non-functional (quality) criteria of the systems under test.
· Create and maintain test data
· Become and stay an expert in the setup, configuration, and usage of the applications under test
· Perform deployments for testing purposes
· Understand the business processes and business needs for being able to perform reasonable exploratory testing
· Provide reasonable quality information and test reporting of your tests, highlight possible delays in time
· Coordinate/cooperate with the team, the QA organisation, the Product Owner, and other stakeholders
· Join and contribute to agile team meetings (backlog grooming, retrospective, review, …)
· Take a leading role on certain releases or projects within the team
· Identify improvement needs and actively drive its implementations in cooperation with the team
· Show high quality focus in all aspects of the role: documentation, test definition and results, communication, processes

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.
Design optical setups and test benches and perform optics and laser-oriented test and experiments focused on state-of-the-art solid state and fibre-laser products and subassemblies.

Keep up to date with the latest technology, practices and concepts in solid state and fibre lasers, optical MEMS, fibre optic technology and communication.

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. Reporting to the Development Lead the successful candidate will also contribute to align with the quality standards and test strategy/process of the company and to continuously drive improvements.
Main duties and responsibilities
· Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations
· Create, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases. These tests concern functional as well as non-functional (quality) criteria of the systems under test.
· Create and maintain test data
· Become and stay an expert in the setup, configuration, and usage of the applications under test
· Perform deployments for testing purposes
· Understand the business processes and business needs for being able to perform reasonable exploratory testing
· Provide reasonable quality information and test reporting of your tests, highlight possible delays in time
· Coordinate/cooperate with the team, the QA organisation, the Product Owner, and other stakeholders
· Join and contribute to agile team meetings (backlog grooming, retrospective, review, …)
· Take a leading role on certain releases or projects within the team
· Identify improvement needs and actively drive its implementations in cooperation with the team
· Show high quality focus in all aspects of the role: documentation, test definition and results, communication, processes

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Job_title: Research Engineer - Optoelectronics and Laser Engineer for Photonics System Technologies (f/m/d)
Description:
Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.
Design optical setups and test benches and perform optics and laser-oriented test and experiments focused on state-of-the-art solid state and fibre-laser products and subassemblies.
Participate in the concept and requirements definition, new technology assessments, and evaluation of alternative technical solutions.
Evaluate laser and laser component performance at the component and system levels via both modelling and hands-on experimental methods.
Keep up to date with the latest technology, practices and concepts in solid state and fibre lasers, optical MEMS, fibre optic technology and communication.

Description:
REQUIREMENTS
We will consider self-employed contractors only for this position, and as such you will be asked to provide us with proof of your self-employment.
Given the time difference with London, and the nature of the role, it is critical for us to work with highly reactive people, fast to respond to emails and calls, in as well out of working hours - in particular during your onboarding process and when working on tickets/deployments.
THE ROLE & KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Based in Vienna, the role holder will be focusing on equipment installation; device configuration; maintenance, testing & troubleshooting.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

The Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria leads the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies used in ArcGIS IPS. Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Job_title: Freelance Hardware/ Data Centre Field Engineer
Description:
REQUIREMENTS
We will consider self-employed contractors only for this position, and as such you will be asked to provide us with proof of your self-employment.
Given the time difference with London, and the nature of the role, it is critical for us to work with highly reactive people, fast to respond to emails and calls, in as well out of working hours - in particular during your onboarding process and when working on tickets/deployments.
THE ROLE & KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Based in Vienna, the role holder will be focusing on equipment installation; device configuration; maintenance, testing & troubleshooting.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. Esri makes indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.
The Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria leads the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies used in ArcGIS IPS. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth low energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from motion sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.
Responsibilities:
Shape the way users of the ArcGIS Runtime SDK for Android consume our cutting-edge Indoor Positioning Technology (IPS) and enable them to build unique experiences

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.

Your Responsibilities

Overview:
Join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. Esri makes indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.
The Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria leads the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies used in ArcGIS IPS. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth low energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from motion sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.
Responsibilities:
Shape the way users of the ArcGIS Runtime SDK for Android consume our cutting-edge Indoor Positioning Technology (IPS) and enable them to build unique experiences

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Overview:
Join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. Esri makes indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.
The Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria leads the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies used in ArcGIS IPS. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth low energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from motion sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.
Responsibilities:
Shape the way users of the ArcGIS Runtime SDK for Android consume our cutting-edge Indoor Positioning Technology (IPS) and enable them to build unique experiences

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. · Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Company Description

As the IT of the REWE Group Austria, with more than 600 employees, we develop innovative IT products and services for all our corporate divisions in Austria and abroad and set the tone for modern trade.
In our newly formed agile "Data Platform" team, you will work on the one-stop-shop for providing, searching, and consuming business relevant data. Your focus as an IT expert is on providing a curated, domain-agnostic tool-set into a simple-to-use environment to enable its customers to provide, search & consume data in a standardised, efficient and decentralised way. Within our dedicated data team, you work on a basis for our new data infrastructure and are responsible for the technical feasibility of projects.

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Job_title: Research Engineer - Optoelectronics and Laser Engineer for Photonics System Technologies (f/m/d)
Description:
Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.
Design optical setups and test benches and perform optics and laser-oriented test and experiments focused on state-of-the-art solid state and fibre-laser products and subassemblies.
Participate in the concept and requirements definition, new technology assessments, and evaluation of alternative technical solutions.
Evaluate laser and laser component performance at the component and system levels via both modelling and hands-on experimental methods.
Keep up to date with the latest technology, practices and concepts in solid state and fibre lasers, optical MEMS, fibre optic technology and communication.

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. Reporting to the Development Lead the successful candidate will also contribute to align with the quality standards and test strategy/process of the company and to continuously drive improvements.

· Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations
· Create, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases. These tests concern functional as well as non-functional (quality) criteria of the systems under test.
· Create and maintain test data
· Become and stay an expert in the setup, configuration, and usage of the applications under test
· Perform deployments for testing purposes
· Understand the business processes and business needs for being able to perform reasonable exploratory testing
· Provide reasonable quality information and test reporting of your tests, highlight possible delays in time
· Coordinate/cooperate with the team, the QA organisation, the Product Owner, and other stakeholders
· Join and contribute to agile team meetings (backlog grooming, retrospective, review, …)
· Take a leading role on certain releases or projects within the team
· Identify improvement needs and actively drive its implementations in cooperation with the team
· Show high quality focus in all aspects of the role: documentation, test definition and results, communication, processes

Job_title: Freelance Hardware/ Data Centre Field Engineer
Description:
REQUIREMENTS
We will consider self-employed contractors only for this position, and as such you will be asked to provide us with proof of your self-employment.
Given the time difference with London, and the nature of the role, it is critical for us to work with highly reactive people, fast to respond to emails and calls, in as well out of working hours - in particular during your onboarding process and when working on tickets/deployments.
THE ROLE & KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Based in Vienna, the role holder will be focusing on equipment installation; device configuration; maintenance, testing & troubleshooting.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. Reporting to the Development Lead the successful candidate will also contribute to align with the quality standards and test strategy/process of the company and to continuously drive improvements.
Main duties and responsibilities
· Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations
· Create, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases. These tests concern functional as well as non-functional (quality) criteria of the systems under test.
· Create and maintain test data
· Become and stay an expert in the setup, configuration, and usage of the applications under test
· Perform deployments for testing purposes
· Understand the business processes and business needs for being able to perform reasonable exploratory testing
· Provide reasonable quality information and test reporting of your tests, highlight possible delays in time
· Coordinate/cooperate with the team, the QA organisation, the Product Owner, and other stakeholders
· Join and contribute to agile team meetings (backlog grooming, retrospective, review, …)
· Take a leading role on certain releases or projects within the team
· Identify improvement needs and actively drive its implementations in cooperation with the team
· Show high quality focus in all aspects of the role: documentation, test definition and results, communication, processes

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Description:
REQUIREMENTS
We will consider self-employed contractors only for this position, and as such you will be asked to provide us with proof of your self-employment.
Given the time difference with London, and the nature of the role, it is critical for us to work with highly reactive people, fast to respond to emails and calls, in as well out of working hours - in particular during your onboarding process and when working on tickets/deployments.
THE ROLE & KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Based in Vienna, the role holder will be focusing on equipment installation; device configuration; maintenance, testing & troubleshooting.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Company Description

As the IT of the REWE Group Austria, with more than 600 employees, we develop innovative IT products and services for all our corporate divisions in Austria and abroad and set the tone for modern trade.
In our newly formed agile "Data Platform" team, you will work on the one-stop-shop for providing, searching, and consuming business relevant data. Your focus as an IT expert is on providing a curated, domain-agnostic tool-set into a simple-to-use environment to enable its customers to provide, search & consume data in a standardised, efficient and decentralised way. Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt in der Mitarbeit und Durchführung von End-to-End Data Science Projekten. In dieser neu geschaffenen Funktion haben Sie außerdem die Möglichkeit, die übergreifende Datenarchitektur für Big Data und Data Analytics mitzugestalten.

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. Reporting to the Development Lead the successful candidate will also contribute to align with the quality standards and test strategy/process of the company and to continuously drive improvements.
Main duties and responsibilities
· Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations
· Create, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases. These tests concern functional as well as non-functional (quality) criteria of the systems under test.
· Create and maintain test data
· Become and stay an expert in the setup, configuration, and usage of the applications under test
· Perform deployments for testing purposes
· Understand the business processes and business needs for being able to perform reasonable exploratory testing
· Provide reasonable quality information and test reporting of your tests, highlight possible delays in time
· Coordinate/cooperate with the team, the QA organisation, the Product Owner, and other stakeholders
· Join and contribute to agile team meetings (backlog grooming, retrospective, review, …)
· Take a leading role on certain releases or projects within the team
· Identify improvement needs and actively drive its implementations in cooperation with the team
· Show high quality focus in all aspects of the role: documentation, test definition and results, communication, processes

Job_title: Research Engineer - Optoelectronics and Laser Engineer for Photonics System Technologies (f/m/d)
Description:
Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.
Design optical setups and test benches and perform optics and laser-oriented test and experiments focused on state-of-the-art solid state and fibre-laser products and subassemblies.
Participate in the concept and requirements definition, new technology assessments, and evaluation of alternative technical solutions.
Evaluate laser and laser component performance at the component and system levels via both modelling and hands-on experimental methods.
Keep up to date with the latest technology, practices and concepts in solid state and fibre lasers, optical MEMS, fibre optic technology and communication.

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

Job_title: Senior Staff Engineer Product Development for GaN-based ICs (f/m/div)*
Description:
Do you want to get to know the development of high-voltage GaN products (like GaN based HEMTs) and even drive it yourself? Can you further on imagine to extend your activities to multicomponent products consisting e.g. of a switch and a driver IC? As a new team member, you will contribute in our product development projects across different sites. Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!

REQUIREMENTS
We will consider self-employed contractors only for this position, and as such you will be asked to provide us with proof of your self-employment.

THE ROLE & KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Based in Vienna, the role holder will be focusing on equipment installation; device configuration; maintenance, testing & troubleshooting.

Overview:
As an enthusiastic and talented C++ software developer, you will join a team that pushes the boundaries of technology to achieve a shared mission: bringing the power of GIS indoors. In the past few years, Esri has put a large effort into making indoor location, indoor mapping, and indoor GIS accessible and powerful for both consumers and experts across all platforms and devices.

At the Esri R&D Center in Vienna, Austria, we lead the research and development of cutting-edge indoor positioning systems technologies. By combining radio signal data from Bluetooth Low Energy beacons and Wi-Fi with trajectory information derived from sensors on everyday mobile devices, we aim to deliver the world’s best indoor blue dot experience for our users.

Description:
Mit der Schalungskompetenz von Doka entstehen rund um den Globus beeindruckende Bauwerke. Das ist die gemeinsame Leistung unserer mehr als 6.800 Mitarbeiter*innen in über 60 Ländern dieser Erde – und darauf sind wir stolz.

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Die Schaffung von Transparenz über interne und externe Daten, sowie die Gewinnung neuer Erkenntnisse aus den vorhandenen Daten stellt die Hauptaufgabe des Machine Learning Teams bei Doka dar. Dafür suchen wir eine analytisch denkende Persönlichkeit, die ebenso für dieses Thema brennt, wie wir!

Description:
As part of an agile engineering team, you will be responsible to ensure that product releases are delivered in high quality and in time. In your role you will be cooperating closely with Product Managers, Developers and QA Engineers to reach these targets together. Reporting to the Development Lead the successful candidate will also contribute to align with the quality standards and test strategy/process of the company and to continuously drive improvements.
Main duties and responsibilities
· Review and challenge incoming requirements to ensure completeness and provide estimations
· Create, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases. These tests concern functional as well as non-functional (quality) criteria of the systems under test.
· Create and maintain test data
· Become and stay an expert in the setup, configuration, and usage of the applications under test
· Perform deployments for testing purposes
· Understand the business processes and business needs for being able to perform reasonable exploratory testing
· Provide reasonable quality information and test reporting of your tests, highlight possible delays in time
· Coordinate/cooperate with the team, the QA organisation, the Product Owner, and other stakeholders
· Join and contribute to agile team meetings (backlog grooming, retrospective, review, …)
· Take a leading role on certain releases or projects within the team
· Identify improvement needs and actively drive its implementations in cooperation with the team
· Show high quality focus in all aspects of the role: documentation, test definition and results, communication, processes

Description:
Your future responsibilities
Design, optimize and prototype complex and highly integrated opto-electronics devices and solid-state and fibre-based Laser sources.
Design optical setups and test benches and perform optics and laser-oriented test and experiments focused on state-of-the-art solid state and fibre-laser products and subassemblies.

Job_title: International Graduate Program: Senior Engineer Technology Development (f/m/div)*
Description:
Are you ready to start your career in a fast-moving, future-oriented environment? Joining our International Graduate Program (IGP) will give you the full insight into Infineon: over the course of 18 months, you will have at least three different assignments – at least one of them abroad. You will meet the global IGP community in global, regional and virtual conferences. From the beginning, you’ll have a chance to roll up your sleeves and take on challenging tasks. Besides that, you have the opportunity to build strong global relationships across sites, functions and departments, and to meet the global IGP community face to face and at virtual conferences. You will get feedback after each assignment, a mentor who gives career advice and a permanent contract from the start. As Senior Engineer Technology Development your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations.
To strengthen our core technology development team for SiC, we are looking for a technology development engineer. Your focus will be the development of new innovative SiC power MOSFET technology generations and processes. The market for SiC will continue to grow significantly in the coming years. Infineon is already a market leader in this segment and will further expand its market position as an innovation driver. If you want to be part of our success story – apply now!
